Sentencas: High penetration of variable renewable energy resources to distribution networks brings new challenges to frequency control in transmission systems; notwithstanding, coordinated exploitation of some widely distributed resources in distribution networks could support overall system frequency control.
Titulo: Frequency Control of Low Inertia Power Grids With Fuel Cell Systems in Distribution Networks

Sentencas: We developed a centralized control scheme to utilize existing solid oxide fuel cell systems in distribution networks to mitigate frequency deviation in the transmission system.
Titulo: Frequency Control of Low Inertia Power Grids With Fuel Cell Systems in Distribution Networks

Sentencas: This novel control scheme minimizes curtailing renewable resources.
Titulo: Frequency Control of Low Inertia Power Grids With Fuel Cell Systems in Distribution Networks

Sentencas: It appropriately prioritizes adjusting active or reactive power of medium voltage connected fuel cell systems to efficiently provides frequency support, while keeping the renewable sources connected.
Titulo: Frequency Control of Low Inertia Power Grids With Fuel Cell Systems in Distribution Networks

Sentencas: A co-simulation platform was also developed to allow for analyzing the interactions between transmission and distribution networks.
Titulo: Frequency Control of Low Inertia Power Grids With Fuel Cell Systems in Distribution Networks

Sentencas: It enhances simulation capability through parallel distributed real-time simulations.
Titulo: Frequency Control of Low Inertia Power Grids With Fuel Cell Systems in Distribution Networks

Sentencas: This platform enables ex-ante analysis of the impact of control strategies of distribution system on transmission system.
Titulo: Frequency Control of Low Inertia Power Grids With Fuel Cell Systems in Distribution Networks

Sentencas: A set of experimental results on European transmission and distribution network benchmarks demonstrated the performance of the developed primary frequency control scheme using solid oxide fuel cell systems.
Titulo: Frequency Control of Low Inertia Power Grids With Fuel Cell Systems in Distribution Networks
